    • Method Detail

      • setSize

        public ApplianceDeployment.Builder setSize(ApplianceSize size)
        A size descriptor based on the number of virtual machines which will be managed by the new vCenter appliance. If #ApplianceSize is not provided, will use the size of the source VCSA
        Parameters:
        size - New value for the property.

      • setDiskSize

        public ApplianceDeployment.Builder setDiskSize(StorageSize diskSize)
        The disk size of the new vCenter appliance. If #StorageSize is not provided, will use the diskSize of the source VCSA.
        Parameters:
        diskSize - New value for the property.

      • setOvaInfo

        public ApplianceDeployment.Builder setOvaInfo(OvaInfo ovaInfo)
        Location of custom OVA for deployment. If null use the OVA file for the desired version in the configured repository.
        Parameters:
        ovaInfo - New value for the property.

      • setCeipEnabled

        public ApplianceDeployment.Builder setCeipEnabled(java.lang.Boolean ceipEnabled)
        This key describes the enabling option for the VMware's Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP). If null, defaults to True
        Parameters:
        ceipEnabled - New value for the property.

        public ApplianceDeployment build()
